title: `push` not providing overall result summary
body:
Here is the entire output of a recursive push of ~5k datasets:

```
mih@bulk1 /ds/hcp/super (git)-[master] % datalad push --to inm7 -r
publish(ok): . (dataset) [refs/heads/master->inm7:refs/heads/master fbd02ef..48f8d0f]                                     
publish(ok): HCP1200/150928 (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex 78e2249..8c08a1a]           [0/9526]
publish(ok): HCP1200/150928 (dataset) [refs/heads/master->inm7:refs/heads/master 44ae154..622a3e7]                        
[ERROR  ] Unknown target sibling 'inm7'. [publish(/ds/hcp/super/HCP1200/150928/T1w)]
publish(error): HCP1200/150928/T1w (dataset) [Unknown target sibling 'inm7'.]
[ERROR  ] Unknown target sibling 'inm7'. [publish(/ds/hcp/super/HCP1200/150928/unprocessed)]
publish(error): HCP1200/150928/unprocessed (dataset) [Unknown target sibling 'inm7'.]
[ERROR  ] Unknown target sibling 'inm7'. [publish(/ds/hcp/super/HCP1200/158540/MNINonLinear)]
publish(error): HCP1200/158540/MNINonLinear (dataset) [Unknown target sibling 'inm7'.]
publish(ok): HCP1200/186444 (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex 4866858..1cca0bf]

publish(ok): HCP1200/186444/T1w (dataset) [refs/heads/master->inm7:refs/heads/master 5387011..456c522]
publish(ok): HCP1200/186444/unprocessed (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex 39c3a52..301e951]
publish(ok): HCP1200/186444/unprocessed (dataset) [refs/heads/master->inm7:refs/heads/master 2f98f52..609c9ae]
publish(ok): HCP1200/188347 (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex b6c1f7a..739169b]

publish(ok): HCP1200/188347/MNINonLinear (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex 3660fa25e..445d0e610]
publish(ok): HCP1200/188347/T1w (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex 1a8e691..61cf5c3]
publish(ok): HCP1200/188347/T1w (dataset) [refs/heads/master->inm7:refs/heads/master 43b4485..77de9fb]
publish(ok): HCP1200/188347/unprocessed (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex db25902..0a2cfb5]
publish(ok): HCP1200/188347/unprocessed (dataset) [refs/heads/master->inm7:refs/heads/master 61acbb4..da19ebc]
publish(ok): HCP1200/193239 (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex 3258796..4bc9617]

publish(ok): HCP1200/193239/MNINonLinear (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex 80a4de8d6..f0df3557e]

publish(ok): HCP1200/198047/MNINonLinear (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex 393804f59..0f6c67661]
publish(ok): HCP1200/198047/MNINonLinear (dataset) [refs/heads/master->inm7:refs/heads/master 1556a5420..da7da966a]

publish(ok): HCP1200/467351 (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex 7713029..4083722]

publish(ok): HCP1200/467351/MNINonLinear (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex 9c0b96ad2..7d8da0ef6]

publish(ok): HCP1200/668361 (dataset) [refs/heads/master->inm7:refs/heads/master 1cec891..89041d6]
publish(ok): HCP1200/705341 (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex 39a3b50..1d9efec]

publish(ok): HCP1200/705341/MNINonLinear (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex 7a714bbf9..4f6a0c6d2]
publish(ok): HCP1200/705341/MNINonLinear (dataset) [refs/heads/master->inm7:refs/heads/master b36413d25..7da55b1c3]
datalad push --to inm7 -r  871.00s user 9749.79s system 92% cpu 3:11:13.39 total
```

In some sense this is pretty cool. it only shows the datasets for which something happened. But it is sadly missing the result summary that I would have expected, and also would confirm that it actually touched all datasets.
